subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In a span of 1 minute 30 seconds early in the third period, the Rangers turned their game against the Devils on its head, scoring three goals, two by Jaromir Jagr.
snippet: In a span of 1 minute 30 seconds early in the third period, the Rangers turned their game against the Devils on its head, scoring three goals, two by Jaromir Jagr.
